post.description:
Extract asset information from file content using LLM

This endpoint takes text content and uses an LLM to extract structured asset information.
The LLM analyzes the content and returns a list of assets with their properties.

Batch create assets from ImageAssetCreateRequest objects

This endpoint takes a list of ImageAssetCreateRequest objects and creates them
as ImageAssets in the database.

Generate an optimized prompt for image asset creation using LLM

This endpoint takes asset information and generator specifications,
then uses an LLM to create an optimized generation prompt.

post.description:
Extract SFX asset information from file content using LLM

This endpoint takes text content and uses an LLM to extract structured SFX asset information.
The LLM analyzes the content and returns a list of SFX assets with their properties.

Batch create SFX assets from SfxAssetCreateRequest objects

This endpoint takes a list of SfxAssetCreateRequest objects and creates them
as SfxAssets in the database.

Generate an optimized prompt for SFX asset creation using LLM

This endpoint takes asset information and generator specifications,
then uses an LLM to create an optimized generation prompt.

file_content.title: File Content
file_content.description: The text content of the file to analyze for assets

assets.title: Assets
assets.description: List of extracted assets with their properties

asset_info.title: Asset Info
asset_info.description: Information about the asset to be generated (flexible key-value pairs)

generator_info.title: Generator Info
generator_info.description: Information about the generator and its capabilities (flexible key-value pairs)

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The generated prompt for asset creation

filename.title: Filename
filename.description: Custom filename to store in database. If not provided, uses the original uploaded filename.

total_failed.title: Total Failed
total_failed.description: Number of assets that failed to create

assets.title: Assets
assets.description: List of SFX assets to create

failed.title: Failed
failed.description: SFX assets that failed to create with error details

total_created.title: Total Created
total_created.description: Number of successfully created SFX assets

total_failed.title: Total Failed
total_failed.description: Number of SFX assets that failed to create

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: User ID - if not provided, defaults to visitor for new sessions

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Project ID - if not provided, defaults to public project for new sessions

title.title: Title
title.description: Optional title for the chat session - used for new sessions or to update existing session title

agent_type.title: Agent Type
agent_type.description: Type of agent to use: 'general' or 'rag'

title.title: Title
title.description: Title for the chat session. If not provided, will generate automatically from chat content.

content.title: Content
content.description: The code map content to store

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: Generation parameters like model, prompt, etc.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text description of the music to generate

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Contains ElevenLabs response JSON (composition_plan and song_metadata)

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text description of the sound effect

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: What to avoid in the generation

prompt_influence.title: Prompt Influence
prompt_influence.description: How closely to follow the prompt
